channel.title: How to make an item only for npc's and not for pking?
channel.description: well i am currently in process of making a new server (will be my first :) ) and i am wanting a wepon to only be used for training, and cant be used against other players, i know there is a way to do this as the server i used to play on did this, any 1 have any thoughts on how to do it?
